00056 #define USART_SUCCESS           0 
00057 #define USART_FAILURE          -1 
00058 #define USART_INVALID_INPUT     1 
00059 #define USART_INVALID_ARGUMENT -1 
00060 #define USART_TX_BUSY           2 
00061 #define USART_RX_EMPTY          3 
00062 #define USART_RX_ERROR          4 
00063 #define USART_MODE_FAULT        5 
00064 
00065 
00067 #define USART_DEFAULT_TIMEOUT   10000

00113 typedef struct
00114 {
00116   unsigned long baudrate;
00117 
00119   unsigned char charlength;
00120 
00124   unsigned char paritytype;
00125 
00129   unsigned short stopbits;
00130 
00133   unsigned char channelmode;
00134 } usart_options_t;
00135 
00137 typedef struct
00138 {
00140   unsigned long iso7816_hz;
00141 
00144   unsigned short fidi_ratio;
00145 
00151   int inhibit_nack;
00152 
00157   int dis_suc_nack;
00158 
00160   unsigned char max_iterations;
00161 
00165   int bit_order;
00166 } iso7816_options_t;

00173 
00175   unsigned char charlength;
00176 
00179   unsigned char channelmode;  
00180   
00182   unsigned char spimode;
00183 } usart_spi_options_t;

00329 #if __GNUC__
00330 __attribute__((__always_inline__))
00331 #endif
00332 extern __inline__ void usart_reset_status(volatile avr32_usart_t *usart)
00333 {
00334   usart->cr |= AVR32_USART_CR_RSTSTA_MASK;
00335 }
00336 
00343 #if __GNUC__
00344 __attribute__((__always_inline__))
00345 #endif
00346 extern __inline__ int usart_parity_error(volatile avr32_usart_t *usart)
00347 {
00348   return (usart->csr & AVR32_USART_CSR_PARE_MASK) != 0;
00349 }
00350 
00357 #if __GNUC__
00358 __attribute__((__always_inline__))
00359 #endif
00360 extern __inline__ int usart_framing_error(volatile avr32_usart_t *usart)
00361 {
00362   return (usart->csr & AVR32_USART_CSR_FRAME_MASK) != 0;
00363 }
00364 
00371 #if __GNUC__
00372 __attribute__((__always_inline__))
00373 #endif
00374 extern __inline__ int usart_overrun_error(volatile avr32_usart_t *usart)
00375 {
00376   return (usart->csr & AVR32_USART_CSR_OVRE_MASK) != 0;
00377 }

00400 extern int usart_send_address(volatile avr32_usart_t *usart, int address);

00410 extern int usart_write_char(volatile avr32_usart_t *usart, int c);
00411 
00417 #if __GNUC__
00418 __attribute__((__always_inline__))
00419 #endif
00420 extern __inline__ void usart_bw_write_char(volatile avr32_usart_t *usart, int c)
00421 {
00422   while (usart_write_char(usart, c) != USART_SUCCESS);
00423 }
00424 
00433 extern int usart_putchar(volatile avr32_usart_t *usart, int c);
00434 
00442 #if __GNUC__
00443 __attribute__((__always_inline__))
00444 #endif
00445 extern __inline__ Bool usart_test_hit(volatile avr32_usart_t *usart)
00446 {
00447   if (usart->csr & AVR32_USART_CSR_RXRDY_MASK)
00448     return TRUE;
00449   else
00450     return FALSE;
00451 }
00452 
00460 #if __GNUC__
00461 __attribute__((__always_inline__))
00462 #endif
00463 extern __inline__ Bool usart_tx_ready(volatile avr32_usart_t *usart)
00464 {
00465   if (usart->csr & AVR32_USART_CSR_TXRDY_MASK)
00466     return TRUE;
00467   else
00468     return FALSE;
00469 }
